item.title: Keyboards by Heikki
item.description: Browse my previous commission keyboards and find more information on how you can order a custom keyboard! Vega by ai03 with GMK Dracula keycaps and Kiwi switches Modded GMMK Pro with GMK Bento and Durock T1 switches

item.title: Keyboard portfolio
